sentences.en: " Mr " is the abbreviation of " Mister ".
sentences.cn: “ Mr ” 是 “ Mister ” 的缩写.

sentences.en: A. D. is the abbreviation for " advertisement " .
sentences.cn: A. D. 是 advertisement 的缩写.

sentences.en: An abbreviation for formula calculation language, a high - level programming language not too widely used.
sentences.cn: 公式计算语言的简称, 应用不太广泛的一种高级程序设计语言.

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, Blog is the abbreviation of Webblog.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 博客这个词是网络日志的缩写.

sentences.en: By convention an atom of an element is represented by an abbreviation of the element's name.
sentences.cn: 按照惯例,一种元素的原子由该元素名称的缩写来表示.

sentences.en: Deviation in aviation is dangerous. Writing is alleviated via bias on abbreviation.
sentences.cn: 在航空过程中的不符合是危险的. 写被关于缩写通过偏见减轻.

sentences.en: Each Reader's Digest condensed book is an abbreviation of an originally longer work.
sentences.cn: 《读者文摘》都是较长原著的缩写本.

sentences.en: Isn't that the abbreviation for manuscript?
sentences.cn: 这不是手稿一词的缩写 吗 ?

sentences.en: Molecular conductor is the abbreviation for the electrically conducting molecular crystal.
sentences.cn: 分子导体是具有导电性的分子晶体的简称.

sentences.en: PFI -- , Germany shoemaking checks Piermasensi the abbreviation of the institute.
sentences.cn: PFI——— 德国皮尔马森斯制鞋测试研究所的简称.

sentences.en: Please explain the meaning of this abbreviation ( mark, symbol ) on the drawing.
sentences.cn: 请解释图上这个缩写 ( 标记 、 符号 ) 的意义.

sentences.en: The abbreviation for Kansas is KS.
The abbreviation key for the reading is given at the end.
sentences.cn: 阅读资料的缩写列在最后.

sentences.en: The AIDS virus is called HIV, an abbreviation for human immunodeficiency virus.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病毒被称为“HIV”, 是人体免疫缺损病毒的缩写.

sentences.en: The postal abbreviation for Kansas is KS.
sentences.cn: 堪萨斯州的邮政缩写是KS。

sentences.en: VOICE: " Multiverse " is an abbreviation for " multiple universes. "
sentences.cn: “多元宇宙 ” 就是宇宙有很多重的缩写.

words.tran_cn: 简短的；小型的；服装超短的

trans.tran_en: a short form of a word or expression
